content: Turn around and go straight ahead to where the enemy holds the spirit. Defeat this enemy to get Blood of the Iron Bull and collect the Charface Spirit.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Height of Ember' and the sub-subsection 'Yoaguai Chief - Father of Stones'.
The content is as follows:
Turn around and go straight ahead to where the enemy holds the spirit. Defeat this enemy to get Blood of the Iron Bull and collect the Charface Spirit.
